artist: Artist: N. Scott Momaday; Printer: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; Publisher: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
inscription:
Within composition, UC: Now in the dawn before it dies, eagle swings / low and wide in a great arc, curving downward to / the place of origin. There is no wind, but there / is a long roaring on the air. It is like the / wind - nor is it quite like the / wind - but / more powerful. / N. Scott Momaday

Stamped, verso: PRINTED AT VERMILLION EDITIONS LTD.
markings:
NumberEd in pencil, LL: AP 14/20
Publisher\'s  blindstamp: VEL
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1983.
signed: Signed and dated in pencil, LR: N. SCOTT MOMADAY 1979
title: Untitled
